metadata.title: Wednesday, 9th October, 2013
metadata.session: THIRD SESSION OF THE ELEVENTH ASSEMBLY

parts: (a)whether the Government has any plans to construct Police Posts at Kafwanka and Lingomukuta in Chembe Parliamentary Constituency; and
(b)if not, what immediate measures the Government has taken to improve security in these and surrounding areas.

questions.minister: Minister of Local Government and Housing
parts: (a)how many Constituencies, countrywide, had received the 2013 Constituency Development Fund (CDF) as of 31st August, 2013;
(b)what factors were inhibiting the Government from disbursing the CDF to the remaining Constituencies;
(c)whether the Constituencies at (b) will receive their CDF by 31st December, 2013; and
(d)when the CDF for Mwembeshi Parliamentary Constituency will be disbursed.

questions.minister: Minister of Agriculture and Livestock when the Government will officially open the Farmers Training Centre in Luwingu District.
Minister of Mines, Energy and Water Development when broken down boreholes in Kaoma District in general, and Lalafuta Ward in particular, will be repaired.
Minister of Agriculture and Livestock whether the Government has any plans to establish more cattle breeding centres in the North-Western Province.
